title: Barbarian
fluff: These humans, cursed with the tainted blood of demons, have earned their moniker 'Half-Orcs' from their tremendous ferocity. With an inner strength only understood by those of the dark, the Half-Orcs stand tall in the shadows of a forgotten world.

specialTalents.name: Magic Attunement.
specialTalents.description: You know detect magic spell, cast it with CHA.

specialTalents.name: Demonic blood.
specialTalents.description:

specialTalents.name: Demonic Possession.
specialTalents.description: Gain a +1 bonus to your damage rolls that lasts 5 rounds. In addition, add half your level to the damage bonus (round down). Make a DC 18 Charisma check. On fail you lose this ability until rest.

talents.talent: Roll to maintain Demonic Possession with advantage
+2 to Strength, Dexterity, or Charisma score
Roll for new Demonic Blood talent
Choose a talent or +2 points to distribute to ability scores

reward.name: Warcamp.
reward.value: Upon reaching the title of Champion of Chaos a half-orc may establish or build a Warcamp. When the construction is complete, a number of followers will arrive to serve.

description.name: Demonic spellcasting.
description.description: You can cast spells you know.

description.name: Magical energy.
description.value: If you fail your spellcasting check, the spell does not take effect. You can't cast that spell again until you complete a rest.

description.name: Magical chaos.
description.value: If you roll a natural 1 on your spellcasting check you must roll on the Mishap table.

description.name: Mishap roll.
description.value: The roll is 2d6 + double spell tier.
